tool_description: This is a small api collection which uses websraping to get the latest highlights from Lankadeepa, Deshaya and BBC sinhala
name: Latest-Sri-Lankan-News
title: Latest-Sri-Lankan-News

api_list.name: bbcSinhala
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://latest-sri-lankan-news.p.rapidapi.com/latest-news/bbcsinhala"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "latest-sri-lankan-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
